Module CompulsoryTask2L3T08
Package taskL3T08

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
taskL3T08.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
The DatabaseManager class handles database operations such as displaying, adding, updating, and deleting records.
